title: Sound Issue
body: The volume of the ability previews isn't effected by the in client sound sliders. (New Client)

replies.body:
You're right! Even the master volume doesn't affect the sounds. I'd imagine this is something the team is aware of, but I'd still recommend posting this on the [**Client Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) so we can track this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
